title: Ceridian to Live-Stream Opening General Session at INSIGHTS 2019
text:
TORONTO & MINNEAPOLIS — Ceridian HCM Holding Inc. (NYSE: CDAY; TSX: CDAY), a global human capital management (HCM) company, today announced it will hold its annual customer forum, INSIGHTS 2019, from October 21 – 25 at the Caesars Palace Hotel and Casino in Las Vegas. The 32nd edition of Ceridian’s HR technology conference will bring together HR professionals, customers, partners, and analysts from around the world.

The INSIGHTS opening session will be live-streamed starting at 4:30 PT. The event will showcase the company’s newest innovations and highlight how Dayforce, Ceridian’s modern cloud platform, helps HR leaders deliver quantifiable value for organizations.

“INSIGHTS is a unique opportunity to see how Ceridian is reimagining the modern workplace by driving great employee experiences and hard dollar returns for customers,” said David Ossip, Chairman and CEO, Ceridian.

The 2019 INSIGHTS program features daily keynotes, more than 50 customer speakers, and 100 sessions covering the most pressing issues facing HR leaders today. Guests will also hear from inspiring celebrity keynote speakers, including Julia Louis-Dreyfus, an eleven-time Emmy Award-winning actress and comedy star, and Terry Crews, a Golden Globe award-winning action and comedy star and former NFL player.

The opening general session will take place on October 22, 2019 at 4:30 p.m. Pacific time. A live webcast and replay of the presentation will be available through Ceridian’s Investor Relations website at https://investors.ceridian.com. For more information about INSIGHTS 2019 and to register, please visit insights.ceridian.com.

About Ceridian HCM Holding Inc.

Ceridian. Makes Work Life Better™.

Ceridian is a global human capital management software company. Dayforce, our flagship cloud HCM platform, provides human resources, payroll, benefits, workforce management, and talent management functionality. Our platform is used to optimize management of the entire employee lifecycle, including attracting, engaging, paying, deploying, and developing people. Ceridian has solutions for organizations of all sizes. Visit Ceridian.com or follow us @Ceridian.
